text: A constitutional referendum happened in Chile on 17 December 2023. The referendum was to see if the public liked a new constitution drafted by an appointed committee of experts and improved by an elected Constitutional Council. The new constitution was approved by the Council on 30 October and the referendum happened on 17 December. The proposed constitution was rejected by a 12-point margin, with 56% of the voters voting against the constitution and 44% voting for it. ==References== Category:December 2023 events Category:Politics of Chile Category:Referendums
title: 2023 Chilean constitutional referendum
